title: Why UI8Kit?
subtitle: A modern approach to building consistent, accessible interfaces.

features.title: Props-Driven Styling
features.description: Semantic props map directly to Tailwind classes. No custom CSS, no className strings.

features.title: DSL Templates
features.description: Use If, Loop, Var from @ui8kit/dsl for stable generation across engines.

features.title: Violet Design Tokens
features.description: Constrained palette with shadcn tokens for light and dark modes.

features.title: Semantic HTML5
features.description: Valid W3C output with Block, Stack, Group, and semantic components.
